  • Field Details

    • pieces

      private int[][] pieces
      A 2D array of all the pieces and their rarity. The first column tracks piece numbers, with the second column tracking its frequency among connected peers.

    • piecesInProgress

      private java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer> piecesInProgress
      Stored pieces currently being worked on to prevent them being worked on to prevent them being working on by two channels, which would be inefficient of other pieces are waiting

    • endGamepiecesObtained

      private java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer> endGamepiecesObtained
      Used to track pieces obtained in endGame

    • piecesRequested

      private int piecesRequested
      Tracks how many pieces have been requested. When all have been requested, End Game is switched on.

    • totalNumPieces

      private int totalNumPieces
      Stores the total amount of pieces needed.

    • piecesMark

      private int piecesMark
      An optimisation, this marker starts at 0 and moves up the pieces array when possible. As it moves, everything behind it should be a gathered piece and everything ahead of it should be a piece yet to be gathered. Various operations in this class will use this marker to indicate the start of the pieces Array, meaning they don't need to iterate over large segments of pieces which have already been obtained and thus reducing time spent iterating over the array.

    • logger

      private java.util.logging.Logger logger
      A logger used to print information if the level is set to CONFIG.

      logger - A logger to output debugging information if required, Messages in this class are set to CONFIG.

    • updatePieceMark

      private void updatePieceMark()

    • pieceUnobtained

      public void pieceUnobtained​(int piece)
      Description copied from class: PiecePicker
      Marks a piece as not obtained. This occurs if a channel is working on a piece and then loses its connection. The piece that it was working on is no longer reachable and thus needs to be returned to the picker for another channel to work on.
      Specified by:
      pieceUnobtained in class PiecePicker
      Parameters:
      piece - The piece that the channel can no longer work on
